roleset.name: make believe

example.name: transitive
example.text: New York-based POP Radio provides, through a national, in-store network, a customized music, information and advertising service which-1 *trace*-1 simulates live radio.
example.arg: which -> a customized music, information and advertising service

example.name: with instrument
example.text: John simulated a VAX ministation with a cardboard box, three or four egg cartons, and a live beaver.
example.arg: with a cardboard box, three or four egg cartons, and a live beaver.

roleset.note: Member of Vncls establish-55.5-1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'simulate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.
